```
# use Quandl Kenneth French Fama/French factors
# http://www.quandl.com/KFRENCH/FACTORS_D

library(Quandl)
library(quantmod)

f <- Quandl(
  "KFRENCH/FACTORS_D"
)

f <- as.xts(f[,-1],order.by=f[,1])

plot.zoo( f, main = NA )
mtext(
  text = "Fama/French Factors from Quandl"
  , adj = 0
  , outer = T
  , line = -2
  , cex = 2
)

```
